Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Enacts the care workforce housing preference act
Summary: Provides for the eligibility of certain households for a care workforce housing preference; provides for the method of application for such preference; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง47-f, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to enacting the "care workforce housing preference act"
